description:
This module aims to expose students to the challenging paths of selected Asian Multinationals in their journey of globalization. The course will discuss major driving forces behind an overseas expansion of some pioneer Asian multinationals, including established corporations from Japan and South Korea; and the critical factors that shape their business success or failure.
Next, the module will study the rapid rise of some emerging markets MNCs, especially those from China, India and selected S.E. Asian countries. Students will learn how visionary leadership and rapid changes in the domestic and global business contexts have shaped the internationalization strategies of Asian MNCs.
title: Global Management of Asian Multinationals
